entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 3:23 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -18.2°C
Wind: NW 32 km/h gust 61 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
